name: places/ChIJY-a5M_dYwokRPEEO4C-vWVI
formattedAddress: 120 Central Park S STE 1, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 120 Central Park S STE 1, New York, NY 10019-1508, USA

originalText.text:
I have been going to see Dr. Levy and his team for over 30 years. I have had nothing but outstanding experiences as a patient. I have an extreme phobia of the dentist and Dr. Levy and his entire group go out of their way to help me get the experience comfortably.
This past well I showed up at the office without an appointment in shear panic thinking I had broken my tooth and caused myself huge problems. Dr. Levy was out and his entire team gave me the utmost of attention , support, and service. Dr. Levy’s associate got me in the chair immediately, assured me I had not broken the tooth, just the temp crown and fixed it immediately. I was amazed at how everyone in the office from admins, nurses, and hygienist came to assist in making me comfortable.
I highly recommend Dr. Levy and his team to anyone who is looking for a top notch dental care. I will never go anywhere else.

originalText.text: Dr. Levy where should I start.... so he has been my dentist since the age of 4 and I am now 30. My teeth have been so healthy because of him. I always walk out of the office feeling great. The staff is also wonderful they are warm and welcoming and they get to know each patient. When I call they know exactly who I am! Not only do I go here but my mom and my brother as well when he lived in the states. I could move anywhere in the world, and wouldn’t change my dentist for anything. I highly recommend Dr. Levy and his team. If you are looking for a pleasant experience or if you are one who freaks out when it comes to the dentist then this is the place to go. Thank you for all you have done Doc & Team!!

originalText.text: I have been going to Dr. Levy for 20+ years now and I highly recommend him.  He is kind & gentle and has literally transformed my smile. I once had fears just hearing the word dentist however now it is enjoyable to not only visit him but also his loving staff.  Everyone I refer to Dr. Levy is beyond satisfied.

originalText.text:
I have been going to Dr. Levy for more then 25 years.  My whole family comes to Dr. Levy. This is not just one man that cares about his patients but the entire office personnel. They are the best.

Does not over book the visits, you are being seen at your appointment time.

originalText.text: This will most likely be the only time in my life I can honestly say I love a dentist's office. Dr Levy is that amazing. Works with you on insurance and makes sure you feel no pain. Can't ask for more!
